name: Messis
description:
In this game, you will have to create and manage your farm from 0.

Be careful, as in France, you will have to pay 26% taxes on what you have earned during the month ! (For the community)

So make the difference between turnover, reinvestment and profit !

Have fun !

Made by two developers, no artist (thanks paint)

The game was made without engine, all in raw code with the SFML.

(Nothing political on that, we just don't have idea)
